channel.title: 317 changing ip Problems
channel.description: Im trying to change the servers Ip and know its client Sided, im using Enrisep's source. im looking in the Client.java but im not finding anywhere to place the IP.. anyone have a damn clue ??

item.title: 317 changing ip Problems
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

Ok.

  1. Go into your client.
  2. Open client.java.
  3. Search for. server =
  4. You found something like this. server = "78.63.211.103";
  5. Change 78.63.211.103 to your ip.
  6. Done!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 changing ip Problems
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

I know in most of the clients that I’ve worked with theres a string in the client.java called ‘server’ that you need to change.

Look in your client files for something along the lines of “127.0.0.1”, “0.0.0.0”, or “localhost”. That might point you in the right direction.

Read full topic
